titles.title: Voluntary State Pilot Mediation Program for MSWPA Lawsuits Act of 1998
To provide that each State may establish a pilot program for mediation of private rights of action under the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary: 3/4/1998--Introduced. Voluntary State Pilot Mediation Program for MSWPA Lawsuits Act of 1998 - Authorizes States to establish a pilot program for mediation of private rights of action under the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.
